resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Besides His stance, the Son's throne is represented by a footestal.
resource.chars: Besides His stance, the Son's throne is represented by a footestal.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The cruciform nimbus is always and only over God's head.
resource.chars: The cruciform nimbus is always and only over God's head.
